Name: VR T72 Battle in Afghanistan
About the game: Through VR virtual simulation, players are brought to the battlefield of Afghanistan full of gunpowder, and they drive steel beasts to fight fiercely with the enemy in the city. Players drive tanks to walk in the streets and alleys of the city, attacking and destroying the tank targets of every hostile target. The enemy's attack will also damage the armor of the tank, after the armor is cleared, the battle is lost. Therefore, while attacking the enemy, do your own protection measures and attack and destroy as many hostile targets as possible. Game operation: Left handle roulette controls tank action The right handle controls the movement of the turret Right handle trigger controls firing
